title: ZenPkgs Browser v1.1.2 Release
content:
## keyboard UX improvements 

 yeah... so, in 1.1.1 (or 1.1.0? i forgot), something i did broke keyboard nav in 2 ways: 
 - when an input was focused, it didn't filter out keybinds (especially annoying for vim-like keybinds) 
 - arrow navigation in search results was broken 

 so what i did was, of course, fix those two issues but i also improved how keyboard navigation feels in general. 

 now, if a node that you're moving to is below 50% of your screen's height, it will animate it so that it's on top of the screen. 

 not a giant update but i hope it still makes your life easier
